attributes.action: Block the FA from selling Wembley National stadium
attributes.background: Selling the stadium for short term financial gain may provide a brief cash injection but in the long run the FA will make much more money as owners once its paid off. English Football will likely lose its home long term due to sale robbing us of our national footballing identity forever!

rejection.details:
Any decision about selling Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You could start a new petition to ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
